meanings.definition: To board a ship or aircraft.
meanings.sent1: The passengers were embarking on the cruise ship for their vacation.
meanings.sent2: We will be embarking on the plane to our destination shortly.
meanings.sent3: Embarking on the spaceship, the astronaut realized he forgot his space helmet.
meanings.sent4: Embarking on this adventure felt like stepping into a whole new world.
meanings.sent5: The act of embarking on the ship was filled with excitement and anticipation.

meanings.definition: To begin a journey or new venture.
meanings.sent1: Embarking on a new chapter in life can be both thrilling and nerve-wracking.
meanings.sent2: The explorers were embarking on a quest to find the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent3: Embarking on a quest for the perfect pizza, the friends tried every pizzeria in town.
meanings.sent4: Embarking on a journey of self-discovery can lead to amazing revelations.
meanings.sent5: The idea of embarking on a new adventure filled her with a sense of freedom and possibility.
